Comments_List: How to look at objects critically and deduce historical trends and events.

Professor Malafronte curated each meeting and helped plan tours and guest speakers at each meeting who shared valuable knowledge on their expertise. Whether it is the priest at Christ Church or a curator at the Collection of Musical Instruments, I was able to learn something new and fascinating in each meeting.

Yes! The material culture of an abstract concept such as music can seem bizarre without any context, but taking case studies of this in each meeting gave a new basis for understanding this concept. Our meetings took place at different locations each week, giving it a sort of field-trip course. We met at the Beinecke several times as well as the music library, the musical recordings collection, the musical instruments collection, Christ church, and a couple other places as well.
Yes -- not too much work, super interesting. The perfect fifth class.
